testimonial.badge: What They Said About Indobiz Corner
testimonial.title: Real stories from our happy clients

testimonials.name: The Love Gurus
testimonials.text: We needed our visas extended and they did it so quickly, even with a holiday in the middle they got everything sorted in a matter of days. There had been a power outage when we got into the airport and 2 of our visas were not coming up in the system and they dealt with all of it swiftly and professionally. Highly recommend using them over trying to do things yourself. All we did was show up and give them our papers and it was all taken care of.

testimonials.name: Sanna Wandtke
testimonials.text: I am really happy with the service provided here, very competent. Because I was a little bit late to extend my visa, it was more complicated, but I got regular whatsapp messages from the nice lady who helped me, to update me about my status. It went all really smoothly. Thanks you for your service!

testimonials.name: Shams W.
testimonials.text: The indobiz team did a fantastic job sorting my visa extension whilst I was away. They took the stress and hassle out for me and processed the visa promptly. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: J. Adam
testimonials.text: I recently extended my visa on arrival, and I was extremely impressed with the service. The staff was highly professional, and the process was both fast and efficient. Additionally, their prices are very competitive. I highly recommend their services. As a thoughtful extra, they even provided condiments, which was a nice touch.

testimonials.name: Louis Jo
testimonials.text: The passport processing service at Visa is very fast. The service here is good and is trusted by foreign tourists. The response given here is very competent and professional. Can handle passport extensions well and be given direction when doing so

hero.title: About our Company.
hero.description: We are established since 2012 with experience from 2002 as a freelance worker in the field of investment and immigration.

mission.description: The company is engaged in business consultants, immigration, environmental and water consultants, labor placement, document service bureaus, and medical equipment distributors.

vision.description: We also manage job training institutions for work placement on cruise ships and work with several colleges in Canada. With a wealth of experience and expertise that we have, good relationships with relevant government agencies and local governments make us pioneers and trusted to complete every task and various cases quickly and precisely, which our competitors cannot accomplish.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: A team of professionals committed to making your visa and business processes stress-free.

ferial.bio: As President Director, Ferial leads the company's strategic direction and ensures long-term operational success. With over 8 years of experience, he has managed various cross-sector projects with a visionary and innovative approach.

ferarry.bio: Ferarry is a Director focused on technology development and digital innovation. He drives the company’s digital transformation and oversees internal tech systems.

sidharta.bio: Sidharta plays a key role in strategic decision-making and business relationship development. He has strong expertise in human-computer interaction and user experience design.

ardiansyah.bio: Ardiansyah oversees the company’s daily operations, ensuring all business processes run efficiently and align with strategic goals.

iqbal.bio: Iqbal manages all aspects of human resources within the company. He focuses on talent development, cultivating a healthy work culture, and implementing effective HR policies and procedures.
